name: Spaced Out (RuddyGoodProductions)
description:
Spaced Out is a game about attempting to navigate through space with a faulty jet-booster that is out of control.

Stationed on  one of the many asteroid mining facilities around planet 'Guinea Two', you find yourself caught in the middle of a dangerous rubble shower. After your ship is compromised, a sudden explosion catapults you into the vastness of space. armed with a faulty jet-booster and a healthy dose of determination, you must battle through asteroids and space junk toward the safety of a distant space shuttle.

Spaced Out was created in 2 days, for the GMTK Game-Jam 2020 where we created all art and code within the 48 hour period.

**CONTROLS**

Hold SPACE to boost in the direction you are currently facing. 

**MUSIC**
